subject: Basketball
Madison Square Garden
lead_paragraph: The W.N.B.A.’s attendance fell to a league-worst average of 8,174 per game in 2005 (from a high of 10,864 in 1998), and some teams routinely draw under 5,000.
snippet: The W.N.B.A.’s attendance fell to a league-worst average of 8,174 per game in 2005 (from a high of 10,864 in 1998), and some teams routinely draw under 5,000.
